name: The Dead-tective
description:
This is a murder mystery game set in the 1980's at a Victorian mansion in the outskirts of Pennsylvania. At this mansion of a rich restaurant entrepreneur, a murder has taken place during a dinner party to celebrate the launch of a new restaurant. You were the victim and now you are trapped in the ethereal plane and for your soul to rest you must help the detective solve your murder! Interact with the material world to get his attention to find the correct clues and save your father who was framed!

This game was created for a Capstone project at the University of Arizona in which the creators were given a semester to create a game. The 2D sprites, models, and music were created by the game designers.

Contributors: Nate Mendoza, Aure Guerrero, Taylor Woodman, Souvenir Tachado.
